description: A figure on the ground, wearing snowshoes and a fur coat, joyfully announces their arrival at Antarctica, the "Bottom of the world," with arms spread wide. Simultaneously, another figure, also in a fur coat but wearing skis, plummets headfirst from a significant height towards the ice. This absurd method of arrival via a steep, uncontrolled descent provides a dark, ironic counterpoint to the enthusiastic welcome. The scene presents a surreal interpretation of reaching a destination through extreme, dangerous vertical motion. The falling figure's attached skis and misplaced pole on the ice underscore the chaotic nature of their trajectory.
caption: “We're here, Eric! Antarctica! ... Bottom of the world!”
